content:
TITLE: Installing APS Authentication SDK with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Autodesk Platform Services Authentication SDK using npm package manager. This package allows developers to implement OAuth 2.0 authentication for APS APIs.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/authentication/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/authentication
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK for Data Management via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the APS SDK for Data Management using npm package manager. This installs the required dependencies for accessing APS Data Management API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/datamanagement/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/data-management
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK for OSS using npm
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the APS SDK for Object Storage Service (OSS) using npm. It allows developers to integrate OSS functionality into their Node.js applications.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/oss/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/oss
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK for Model Derivative with NPM
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Model Derivative module from the APS SDK using NPM. This package allows developers to derive viewable outputs from CAD files and extract model metadata.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/modelderivative/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/model-derivative
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK for WebHooks using npm
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the APS SDK for WebHooks using npm. It adds the @aps_sdk/webhooks package to your project dependencies.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/webhooks/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/webhooks
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK Construction Issues Module
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Construction Issues module of the APS SDK using npm. This module enables programmatic management of issues in Autodesk Construction Cloud projects.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/construction/issues/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/construction-issues
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing APS SDK for Construction Account Admin via npm
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the APS SDK for Construction Account Admin using npm. It's a prerequisite for using the SDK in a Node.js project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/construction/accountadmin/source/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i @aps_sdk/construction-account-admin
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Displaying Badges for Node.js, npm, and License in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to create badges in Markdown for Node.js version, npm version, and license information. The badges use shields.io to display version and license details.
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Markdown
CODE:
```
[![node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-16.16-blue.svg)](https://nodejs.org)
[![npm](https://img.shields.io/badge/npm-8.11-blue.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache%202.0-green.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Apache-2.0)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Changelog Documentation
DESCRIPTION: A markdown formatted changelog documenting version history, including implemented enhancements, fixed bugs, and merged pull requests across multiple SDK versions
SOURCE: https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# Changelog

## [v1.1.0](https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/tree/v1.1.0) (2025-02-26)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/compare/v1.0.2...v1.1.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**

- \[DAS 332\] - Added comments in webhooks client and statusfilter bug fix [\#101](https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/pull/101)
- \[DAS 324\] - Add AUS to region and update ManifestDerivative model [\#99](https://github.com/autodesk-platform-services/aps-sdk-node/pull/99)
...
```
